/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. In the distance, a hill rises, crowned with a flagpole that proudly displays a Chinese flag, fluttering in the breeze. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's landscape.
